name: teams_unlink-external-idp-group-from-team-for-org
description:
Deletes a connection between a team and an external group.

You can manage team membership with your IdP using Enterprise Managed Users for GitHub Enterprise Cloud. For more information, see [GitHub's products](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.7/github/getting-started-with-github/githubs-products) in the GitHub Help documentation.

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

team_slug.description: The slug of the team name.
